sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Task } from '../models/task.model'; // Import Task model import { ProjectDataService } from '../data/project-data.service'; // Import the service @Component({ selector: 'app-task-list', templateUrl: './task-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task-list.component.scss'] }) export class TaskListComponent implements OnInit { tasks: Task[] = []; // Explicitly define tasks as Task[] filteredTasks: Task[] = []; // Explicitly define filteredTasks as Task[] taskStatuses = ['Not Started', 'In Progress', 'Completed']; priorities = ['High', 'Medium', 'Low']; teamMembers = ['John', 'Alice', 'Bob']; filterStatus: string = ''; // Initialize filterStatus filterPriority: string = ''; // Initialize filterPriority filterAssigned: string = ''; // Initialize filterAssigned filterDueDate: string = ''; // Initialize filterDueDate taskSummary = { notStarted: 0, inProgress: 0, completed: 0 }; constructor(private projectDataService: ProjectDataService, private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.projectDataService.getTasks().subscribe(tasks => { this.tasks = tasks; this.filteredTasks = tasks; this.updateTaskSummary(); }); } applyFilters() { this.filteredTasks = this.tasks.filter((task: Task) => { return ( (this.filterStatus ? task.status === this.filterStatus : true) && (this.filterPriority ? task.priority === this.filterPriority : true) && (this.filterAssigned ? task.assignedTo === this.filterAssigned : true) && (this.filterDueDate ? task.dueDate.toLocaleDateString() === new Date(this.filterDueDate).toLocaleDateString() : true) ); }); } updateTaskSummary() { this.taskSummary.notStarted = this.tasks.filter(task => task.status === 'Not Started').length; this.taskSummary.inProgress = this.tasks.filter(task => task.status === 'In Progress').length; this.taskSummary.completed = this.tasks.filter(task => task.status === 'Completed').length; } goToTaskDetail(task: Task) { this.router.navigate(['/task-detail', task.taskTitle]); } }
Task Summary
Not Started: {{ taskSummary.notStarted }} In Progress: {{ taskSummary.inProgress }} Completed: {{ taskSummary.completed }}
Task List Status All Status {{ status }} Priority All Priority {{ priority }} Assigned To All Members {{ member }} Due Date All Dates {{ date }}
Task Title Assigned To Status Priority Due Date
Task Title {{ task.taskTitle }} Assigned To {{ task.assignedTo }} Status {{ task.status }} Priority {{ task.priority }} Due Date {{ task.dueDate | date:'shortDate' }} Action
